bibl.title: Ostraca from Western Thebes Provenance and History of the Collections at the Metropolitan Museum of Art and at Columbia University.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Attempts to localize published and unpublished Coptic ostraca within their archaeological contexts. - 1. MMA Egyptian Expedition excavations. - 2. Ostraca given to the MMA by other mission in Western Thebes. - 3. Ostraca possibly from Western Thebes, purchased by or given to the MMA. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Elisabeth R. O'Connell, Ostraca from Western Thebes Provenance and History of the Collections at the Metropolitan Museum of Art and at Columbia University.

Attempts to localize published and unpublished Coptic ostraca within their archaeological contexts. - 1. MMA Egyptian Expedition excavations. - 2. Ostraca given to the MMA by other mission in Western Thebes. - 3. Ostraca possibly from Western Thebes, purchased by or given to the MMA. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
